name: Flawless (Ditzie, Salt_Mate)
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg.  With a new topic  every week, Game Design Students develop a prototype-like game to improve their GameDev skills by coming up with quick solutions with minimal resources.

The given topic for this project : "In (my) mind".

Flawless is a short dialogue focused game about feeling weird and body positivity

Game Description  

Key Features

  • Read through a dialogue about feeling insecure with your own body and body positivity
  • Look at exaggerated flaws like 'Stretch marks' and give them some love
  • Craft your own little Body Positivty -Reminder at the end of the game by choosing between 4 different Images of a real looking body.

Credits


  • Ditzie Doodle - Art & Game Design
  • Salt_Mate - Code & Game Design
  • Music: Genesis Imspirational Piano Music, by Johnny Easton
  • Soundeffects : freesound.org
